doc:
Lloyd Pearson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lloyd_Pearson 0 Lloyd Mawson Pearson (13 December 1897 – 2 June 1966) was a British actor, born in Cleckheaton, near Batley in the West Riding of Yorkshire.He died in London on 2 June 1966 aged 68. Lloyd_Mawson_Pearson ( 13_December_1897 – 2_June_1966 ) was a_British_actor , born in Cleckheaton , near Batley in the_West_Riding of Yorkshire.He died in London on 2_June_1966_aged_68 .
